Uses of Class
fif_core.Filter

  • Packages that use Filter 
    Package Description
    fif_core  
    fif_learning

    • Uses of Filter in fif_core

      Subclasses of Filter in fif_core 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DescriptionBasedFilter
      This class provides the real implementation of a filter.
      class  ParallelFilter
      This class represent a parallel filter, that is a composite structure for two or more filters in which the order is not important.
      class  SequenceFilter
      This class represent a sequence filter, that is a composite structure for two or more filters in which the order is important and the output of a filter filtering is the input of the next filter.
      Methods in fif_core that return types with arguments of type Filter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.AbstractList<Filter> SequenceFilter.getAllFilters()
      This method returns an abstract list of all the filters in the sequence filter.
      java.util.AbstractList<Filter> ParallelFilter.getAllFilters()
      This method returns an abstract list of all the filters in the parallel filter.
      Methods in fif_core with parameters of type Filter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double Filters.complement(Resource r, double v, Filter f)
      Complements the filtered value of a filter, with a initial starting value.
      static double Filters.complement(Resource r, Filter f)
      Complements the filtered value of a filter.
      void ParallelFilter.setParallelFilters(Filter... list)
      This method allows to set a list of filters composing the parallel filter.
      void SequenceFilter.setSequence(Filter... list)
      This method allows to set a list of filters composing the sequence filter.
      Constructors in fif_core with parameters of type Filter 
      Constructor and Description
      ParallelFilter(Aggregator a, Filter... list)
      Builder that sets the aggregator and the list of filters composing the parallel filter.
      SequenceFilter(Filter... list)
      Builder that sets the the list of filters composing the parallel filter.

    • Uses of Filter in fif_learning

      Methods in fif_learning that return Filter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Filter FilterCreation.createFilter(ResourceRegister rr, Resource r)
      Creates new filter basing the result on the input resources.
      static Filter FilterUpdate.updater(ResourceRegister rr, Filter f)
      If the filtering grade between a resource and a filter doesn't surpass a specific input-defined threshold, the filter is then put in a Parallel Filter along with the filter created using the resource, during the update phase.
      static Filter FilterUpdate.updaterWithConfig(ResourceRegister rr, Filter f, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> userConfig) 
      Methods in fif_learning with parameters of type Filter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Filter FilterUpdate.updater(ResourceRegister rr, Filter f)
      If the filtering grade between a resource and a filter doesn't surpass a specific input-defined threshold, the filter is then put in a Parallel Filter along with the filter created using the resource, during the update phase.
      static Filter FilterUpdate.updaterWithConfig(ResourceRegister rr, Filter f, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> userConfig)
